title: WCAS HISTORY 483-0-20 Literature of Japanese History

descriptions.name: Overview of class
descriptions.value: This course varies depending on the students enrolled. Generally I focus on 20th century social-cultural-economic histories.

descriptions.name: Registration Requirements
descriptions.value: GRADING BASIS: P/N fine for eligible students (not first-year graduate students, etc.)

descriptions.name: Evaluation Method
descriptions.value: EVALUATION METHOD: Weekly short papers by each student, posted in advance. Students must read each other's papers by each class as well.

descriptions.name: Class Materials (Required)
descriptions.value:
***Tentative until order posted to Norris website
READING LIST: Individualized for each student

descriptions.name: Class Notes
descriptions.value: NOTES: Students should post first paper BEFORE first class meeting?contact me in advance

subject: HISTORY
